attributes.additional_details:
With so many current conflicts around the world, we need to ensure that we have a sufficient Armed Forces Strength in order to defend these no only these conflicts are properly resourced, but that our homelands and our brave Armed Forces are not put in danger.

This must be debated fully with public involvement and even, if required, a Public Referendum.  Cameron and his cronies must not be allowed to go back on his pre election mandates continually.
